code: @Test public void testMultiplePoliciesOnRoute() throws Exception {     // we use seda which are not persistent and hence can loose a message     // when we get graceful shutdown support we can prevent this     getMockEndpoint("mock:success").expectedMinimumMessageCount(size - 10).     for (int i = 0. i < size. i++) {         template.sendBody(url, "Message " + i).         Thread.sleep(3).     }     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
